value:
$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Smile2|You have done well to make it this
far, children of Midgard...considering
the deficits of your kind.$k$pHere, you will witness the fruits of
my ambitions: Gullveig will be born.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|King Njörðr! You have betrayed us
and crushed poor Seiðr!$k$pAnd now you wish to destroy the
world? ...Why?!$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Know your place, mortal. What right
do you have to address me?$k$pI am king of Vanaheimr, the realm
of light... I am supreme. I reign as
a god among gods.$k$pBut time is cruel even to those
of us beyond mortality.$k$pEven my light faded over the ages...$k$p...Why? What joke is it that a god
should fear what is to come?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Anger|And all the while, the infestation of
mortals has spiraled out of control.$k$pThe gods diminish, and the insects
multiply and multiply to fill the space
the gods leave behind... Abhorrent.$k$pIf that is the way time will treat
us, then time is best erased.
I will end it myself.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|And so, that was your reason—
for all of this...for Heiðr...$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face|I am not to blame for everything.
It was not I who killed Heiðr.$k$p$EFace_Smile2|It was you, Seiðr. You killed her.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Gyaaaggghhh!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Hmph... You mortals are a waste
of my attention. The Golden Seer will
dispose of you, as she is meant to.$k$p

$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Show yourself, Gullveig!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Njörðr, wait!$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Gullveig! Why do you delay?!$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It's her!$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Smile3|Hah... Finally.$k$pYou mustn't make your king wait.$k$pNow...exterminate them.$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Why do you hesitate? ...Kill them!
That is your purpose! Destroy the
world and kill the mortals!$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|...To destroy the world, kill the
mortals, and...$k$pI am here to end you as well.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What was that?!$k$pYou owe me...everything! Have you
forgotten that it was I who blessed
you with my light?!$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|You have grown old. You fear the
waning of your youth and power...$k$pI will put those fears to rest.$k$p$EFace_Cool|You will have nothing to fear
when you are dead.$k$p$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch00_51_Njord_M_Normal,Face_Pain3|N-no! Stop this! No! NO!$k$p$bEvBG_v0708b_S7105_ED|$Fi2000|$WmMPID_ニョルズ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Gwaaaah!
Ah...ah...$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$bEvBg_LightTempleFade|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$Fi1500|...$k$p$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|What you wished for has been
done, Seiðr.$k$pI know you would have done
as I have.$k$pI remember...being you.$k$p$Sbs150|
